article_text: The intersection between Jeb Bush’s private and public life — calls for fracking have been a part of his speeches and came as recently as last month in San Francisco — triggers questions of disclosure.

article_metadata.title: Jeb Bush’s private investments in fracking dovetail with public advocacy | Miami Herald
